baragwin.name: Baragwin Weapon
baragwin.description: On a successful Critical Hit, grants +1 die of damage (after multiplying for the Critical Hit). Weapon is considered Illegal.

bothan.name: Bothan Weapon
bothan.description: Deals +1 die of damage when set to Stun or dealing Ion damage, but -1 die of damage otherwise. Requires weapon with Ion or Stun setting.

dashade.name: Dashade Weapon
dashade.description: Target moved down Condition Track can only spend 2 Swift Actions per turn to Recover until returned to normal. -2 penalty to damage rolls. Illegal.

gand.name: Gand Weapon
gand.description: Stun damage halves speed (or Immobilizes at -4 CT) until normal. Exotic proficiency (except for Gand). Requires Stun setting.

quickDraw.name: Quick Draw Weapon
quickDraw.description: With Quick Draw feat, can draw/holster as Free Action once per round.

rakatan.name: Rakatan Weapon
rakatan.description: Die type +1 step (d4→d6→d8→d10→d12 max), +1 Equipment bonus to attacks. Exotic proficiency (except for Rakata).

sithAlchemical.name: Sith Alchemical Weapon
sithAlchemical.description: Lightsaber doesn't ignore DR. Can use Block/Deflect talents. Force Point adds DSS to damage (increases DSS by 1). Advanced Melee or Simple Melee only.

antiquated.name: Antiquated Weapon
antiquated.description: Pre-Legacy powered weapon. Rare, +50% ammo cost, +5 repair DC. Can be Refitted instead.

refitted.name: Refitted Weapon
refitted.description: Rare, uses standard ammo, +10% shots, +5 repair DC, weekly maintenance required.

disruptor.name: Disruptor Weapon
disruptor.description: Treats DT as 5 lower. Kills disintegrate target. Fires every other round. No multi-shot feats. 1/10 ammo (pistol) or 1/5 (other).

jawa.name: Jawa Weapon
jawa.description: 50% cheaper. Natural 1 disables weapon (grenades explode on wielder). Grenades can't fit in launcher.

jedaii.name: Je'daii Weapon
jedaii.description: Lightsaber doesn't ignore DR. Force Point adds WIS modifier to damage (next attack before start of next turn). Simple Melee only.

mandalorian.name: Mandalorian Armor
mandalorian.description: +1 Fort equipment bonus. DR applies vs Lightsabers. Intimidation bonus in Mandalorian Wars era.

bonadanAlloy.name: Bonadan-Alloy Armor
bonadanAlloy.description: DR 2 vs Slashing, -1 Fort equipment bonus. Requires Fort bonus.

bronziumCast.name: Bronzium Cast Armor
bronziumCast.description: Once/encounter redirect attack damage to armor. Armor has HP/DR/DT and can be disabled/destroyed.

durasteelCast.name: Durasteel Cast Armor
durasteelCast.description: DR 1, -1 Fort equipment bonus. Requires Fort bonus.

environmentalBastion.name: Environmental Bastion Armor
environmentalBastion.description: Space suit functionality. Breathable air = Fort equipment bonus in hours. Requires Fort bonus.

eriadun.name: Eriadun Armor
eriadun.description: DR 5 vs Stun, -1 Fort equipment bonus. Requires Fort bonus.

stygianTriprismatic.name: Stygian-Triprismatic Polymer Armor
stygianTriprismatic.description: +1 Reflex equipment bonus, +2 Stealth vs electronic sensors.

arkanian.name: Arkanian
arkanian.description: Weapons: Energy+Fire damage, overheats on multi-shot. Armor: Double Fort vs Extreme Cold, no Fort vs Extreme Heat.

cinnagaran.name: Cinnagaran
cinnagaran.description: Weapons: Energy+Bludgeoning. Armor: DR 5 vs Sonic, -1 Max Dex.

cortosisWeave.name: Cortosis Weave / Phrik Alloy
cortosisWeave.description: Lightsaber doesn't ignore weapon/armor DR. Not Rare in Old Republic Era.

echani.name: Echani
echani.description: Weapons: Once/enc expand crit range by 1, half HP. Armor: Half weight, once/enc normal speed, -1 Reflex.

genoharadan.name: GenoHaradan
genoharadan.description: Weapons: +2 Poison/+1 Stun/disabled on Nat 1. Armor: +2 Stealth, -1 Fort.

iridonian.name: Iridonian
iridonian.description: Weapons: +2 Power Attack/Blast dmg, Illegal. Armor: DR 2 Bludgeoning, Illegal.

krath.name: Krath
krath.description: Weapons: 1d4 bleed if hit Ref+Fort. Armor: DR 2 Energy. Both: +1 DSS for targeting.

mandalorian.name: Mandalorian
mandalorian.description: +5 Mechanics to repair/modify. Accessories destroyed if item disabled.

massassi.name: Massassi
massassi.description: Weapons: Triple Str on 2H crit, Str req or -2. Armor: Crit→hit 1/enc, Str req or penalties.

prototype.name: Prototype
prototype.description: 2 Tech Specialist mods. Weapons: Nat 1-4 = disabled. Armor: +1 die on crit (before multiply).

verpine.name: Verpine
verpine.description: Weapons: Swift Ion mode, Int 13 or -2. Armor: DR 10 Ion, Dex 13 or penalties.
